changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIMEOFFSET_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIMEOFFSET_STAGING_EXCEPTION ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID() CONSTRAINT PK_STAGING_EXCEPTION PRIMARY KEY, PAYLOAD NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, EXCEPTION_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL DEFAULT GETUTCDATE() )
